title: MSI Gaming laptop
body:
should i buy the MSI League of Legends icon coz i own a cool MSI Laptop :D??? ^_^
(i dont know much about the esports behind it ;c)

replies.body:
guys i never talked about the Laptop hahahahaha xD
{{champion:134}}
I mean I have a 960m gtx laptop and I run perfectly
A, if you want it for gaming, get a desktop/tower not a PC, and B, you can make an MSI comp for less than a 1/3 the retail price using MSI brand parts.
